definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: How is the difficulty level for each word determined?
sentences.chinese: 每個詞彙是如何歸入不同的難度等級的？

sentences.english: I just want to know how many difficulty modes are there in SC2.
sentences.chinese: 我想問一下星際2有多少級難度模式？

sentences.english: The highly complex maneuver is known as the Cheng Fei vault.
sentences.chinese: 這一套高難度的動作便是人們所熟知的“程菲跳”。

sentences.english: It was very difficult for Pepe to achieve what he's already done in one year at Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 在利物浦頭年的成功對雷納來說難度很大。

sentences.english: These taxing questions are too difficult for me to answer.
sentences.chinese: 思考題難度太大了，我不會解答。

sentences.english: This is a game that is worth replaying on the harder difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 本作可玩性非常之高，通關後值得挑戰更高難度。

sentences.english: This mathematics problem is extremely difficult.
He was calm and steady when playing difficult things.
sentences.chinese: 在演奏一些難度片斷時，他依然很淡定。

sentences.english: But Nunez says drug smugglers are not always easy to catch.
sentences.chinese: 但弩內茲還表示，逮捕毒販一直有其難度。

sentences.english: This helicopter is used by the flight group “Berkuts” (golden eagles) that performs difficult flights on military helicopters.
sentences.chinese: “金雕”飛行隊用這架直升機做高難度飛行表演。

sentences.english: Tests are similar to recent actual GREs in length, question types, and degree of difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 模擬試題長度和難度接近真實考試。

sentences.english: The geologic condition is complicate for Baolige oilfield which is difficult to develop.
sentences.chinese: 寶力格油田地質條件複雜，開發難度較大。

sentences.english: These differences make it very difficult to have one-size-fits-all rules for all occasions.
sentences.chinese: 這些不同使所有地區制度一體化的實現難度很大。

sentences.english: Successfully complete the game on the hard difficulty setting eight times to unlock all Epilogues.
sentences.chinese: 在困難難度下八次完成遊戲即可開啓所有後記。

sentences.english: Here's a harder case to think about.
sentences.chinese: 下面這個案例的難度更大點。

sentences.english: It is difficulty to operate the basic buret.
sentences.chinese: 這種二指操作法難度大。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
doorstep/sill/threshold/fig. knack or trick (esp. scheme to get sth cheaper)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
